channel.title: Melodic Death Metal anyone? :D
channel.description:
Anybody heard of the band [b]Insomnium[/b] ? :| Well...i was thinking about sharing this great band with you people! Coz i love [b]Insomnium[/b]!
[u]Insomnium - In The Halls Of Awaiting[/u] [url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=zjMCS-B8V3o]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=zjMCS-B8V3o[/url] [u]Insomnium - The Elder[/u] [url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=i9_02hsKfag]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=i9_02hsKfag[/url] [u]Insomnium - Dying Chant[/u] [url=http://youtube.com/watch?v=mSViY_SifQk]http://youtube.com/watch?v=mSViY_SifQk[/url]

item.title: Melodic Death Metal anyone? :D
item.dc:creator: @slayer215 slayer215
item.description:
@slayer215 wrote:

Insomnium rules. But in my opinion they cant really be compared with COB, their styles are just so different. COB wins for everything on Follow the Reaper, Insomnium wins on lyrics and breakdowns. They are both really, really good bands. I just hate it when people try to compare two awesome things like this.
If youre just getting into melodeath, try Kalmah and Wintersun.

Read full topic

item.title: Melodic Death Metal anyone? :D
item.dc:creator: @PeterMan PeterMan
item.description:
@PeterMan wrote:

Speljohan:

I only like a few Melodic Death Metal bands, i hate the ones from sweden (excluding Arch Enemy). This also depends on what you count as Melodic Death. I wouldn’t count Children of Bodom to that genre because they aren’t heavy enough to be a Death Metal band. They are more extreme power metal.

Yeah thats what I heard from my friend’s big brother (that COB is power metal) :P… I think Finnish metal bands are often the best ones ;D

[quote=“The Un-Named, post:5, topic:157392”]Children of Bodom plays a few type of genre, therefor one band cannot be better than Children of Bodom.

But anyway, the two songs you posted, they seem a little slow. Only listened to bits though.[/quote]

Theire a little slow yes…But I think both of thoose songs are awesome…actually any of theire songs
I can see if i find something faster

Read full topic

item.title: Melodic Death Metal anyone? :D
item.dc:creator: @PeterMan PeterMan
item.description:
@PeterMan wrote:

Bodom …? Sorry no offence but i dont listen to them anymore coz i think theire getting pwned by Insomnium :P… but hey! Thats MY opinion ;D + Insomnium got the best growling i heard in ages !
